EmailTemplate.name: BCBS Montana Provider On_Boarding
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Montana Provider On-boarding Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Name_Submitter__c},
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Montana.
This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}.
Your request may take up to 14 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address you provided during your submission.
To check the status of your case, please click on status checker({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}) or for any questions contact Network Management at 406-437-6100, or email HCS-X6100@bcbsmt.com.
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Montana
